text:
Here is what’s wrong with the way the #NCAA treats student-athletes:

If you pretend to be a college athlete, you can make YouTube videos off your publicity rights for marginal income.

If you are ACTUALLY a college athlete, that same action gets you ruled ineligible.pic.twitter.com/BKq4ZfVZaT

html: We already have a commission to secure the border. It’s called Congress. When boys and girls are being trafficked and families are burying addicted children, we should be building physical barriers proven to work, not commissions that don’t.
text:
We already have a commission to secure the border. 

It’s called Congress. 

When boys and girls are being trafficked and families are burying addicted children, we should be building physical barriers proven to work, not commissions that don’t.

html: They decided to hold off on having their formal wedding until Jacqueline’s father could return home. They waited patiently for another 20 months, advocating for the release of her father and staying strong in faith and prayer.

html: Kevin, serving in the U.S. military, could not postpone the wedding. Kevin and Jacqueline were married in civil court in February 2017, while Jacqueline’s father was held in a cell with 21 other inmates that was built to hold only 8 prisoners.

html: #NeverForget Sgt. Jason Thomas was dropping his daughter off when he saw the towers collapse. He rushed to the scene going 120MPH, put on his retired Marine Corps uniform, and searched tirelessly through the rubble. Thomas saved two police officers that day.pic.twitter.com/BviFNkpHHB
text:
#NeverForget

Sgt. Jason Thomas was dropping his daughter off when he saw the towers collapse. He rushed to the scene going 120MPH, put on his retired Marine Corps uniform, and searched tirelessly through the rubble.

Thomas saved two police officers that day.pic.twitter.com/BviFNkpHHB
